name: Doctor Carrina
title: Oceanographer
abilityWindow: When another player researches a technology
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to ignore 1 prerequisite; if they do, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements into coexistence on a non-home planet they control.

name: Aello
title: Ikaten Kieros
abilityWindow: When another player spends resources to research a technology
abilityText: That player may reduce the cost by 1; if they do, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
unlockCondition: Have an ocean card in play.

name: Ta Zern
title: Conclave Founder
abilityName: Wave Function Collapse - The Laws Unwritten
abilityText: Purge this card and a non-unit upgrade technology you own or from your deck; then, purge all cards with the same name owned by other players and in other players' decks. Then, each player that purged a technology they owned researches another technology.

name: Unknown
title: Unknown
abilityText: Exhaust this card to choose 1 player. That player may swap the position of 2 of their ships in any systems; they may transport units when they swap.

name: Unknown
title: Unknown
abilityWindow: At the end of a combat between any players:
abilityText: Gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.

name: Unknown
title: Unknown
abilityText: You may place any of those ships onto this card. At the start of a space combat, you may purge this card to place all ships from this card into the active system.

name: Kan Kip Rel
title: Courier Prime
abilityText: Exhaust this card and draw 2 action cards; give 1 of those cards to another player.

name: Director Nel
title: Acquisitive Mind
abilityText: You may choose to no longer be passed; if you do, gain 2 command tokens, draw 1 action card, and purge this card.

name: Xxekir Grom
title: The Council's Heart
abilityText: Place any combination of up to 4 PDS or mechs onto planets you control; ready each planet that you place a unit on. Then, purge this card.

name: Myru Vos
title: The Hungry Shadow
abilityText: You may exhaust this card; if you do, SPACE CANNON cannot be used against those ships. If they are not transporting units, they can also move through other players' ships.

name: Captain Aroz
title: The Black Flag
abilityText: You can treat planets in systems that contain your ships as if they were controlled by you for the purpose of scoring secret objectives.
unlockCondition: Have a plot card in play

name: Sharsiss
title: The Coiling Void
abilityName: The Blade Beckons - Knife in the Back
abilityText: Place 1 of your plot cards in play with any other player's control token on it. Then, you may place any player's control token on 1 of your in-play plot cards; one plot cannot have two of the same player's tokens. Then, purge this card.

name: Vos Hollow
title: Hunger Burning
abilityWindow: When a player's ship is destroyed during any combat
abilityText: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player's opponent must destroy 1 of their ships of the same type in the active system.

name: Aroz Hollow
title: Broken Standard
abilityText: Apply +1 to the result of each of your units' combat rolls in the Fracture.

name: Sharsiss Hollow
title: Sanity Snapped
abilityText: Ready all of your planets. Then, purge this card.
